item.description:
Hey all...I won't be here for this class....I will be back in April!
I am waiting to here whether there will be a sub or not.

Also, FYI
I WILL BE TRAINING THE FIRST MAINE GROUP OF LAUGHTER YOGA LEADERS IN MAINE in MAY!

Let me know if you are interested.

Otherwise, I will post whether it is canceled for March or if someone else will be there!

Be well and keep laughing!
Katie
item.how_to_find_us: Jai Yoga is located on the third floor of Fort Andross
item.name: Maine Laughter Yoga Club w/ The Levity Coach March Meetup
